page.home.head.title: Wadza
page.home.product.card.label.creator: Creator
page.home.referral.program.section.label: Referral
Program
page.home.referral.program.section.descr: Invite potential contributors and get 20% of the profits or more
To participate in the referral program, send the generated link to the author in the Referrals section of your personal account. Having more sales means a bigger profit share percentage.
page.home.referral.program.section.label: Absolutely payments
Referrals attracted
Users
page.home.browse.by.category.section.des: You can pick the right category for yourself
page.home.introduction.section.descripti: Don't worry, we got you. You can pay with your visa card like all online shops, we will create a wallet for you and take care of everything.
Get comfortable with the basics of NFTs. Learn everything that you need.
page.home.footer.section.description.1: Join our mailing list to stay in the loop with our newest feature releases, NFT drops, and tips and tricks for navigating Wadza.
page.home.footer.section.description.2: Stay updated with the latest news about Wadza, new collections, and important events.
page.home.footer.section.description.3: The MENA's first and largest marketplace for crypto collectibles and non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Buy, sell and discover exclusive digital items.
page.nft.creation.title: Create new Item
page.nft.creation.image.label: Image, Video, Audio, or 3D Model
page.nft.creation.image.desc: File type supported: JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, MP4, WEBM, MP3, WAV, OGG, GLB, GLTF. Max size: 100 MG.
page.nft.creation.collection.label: Collection
page.nft.creation.collection.desc: This is the collection where your item will appear
page.nft.creation.attribute.properties.d: Textual traits that show up as rectangles
page.nft.creation.attribute.levels.name: Levels
page.nft.creation.attribute.levels.desc: Numerical traits that show as a progress bar
page.nft.creation.attribute.stats.name: Stats
page.nft.creation.attribute.stats.desc: Numerical traits that just show as numbers
page.nft.creation.attribute.unlockable.d: Include unlockable content that can only be revealed by the owner of the item.
page.nft.creation.attribute.explicit.des: Set this item as explicit and sensitive content
page.nft.creation.freeze.label: Freeze metadata
page.nft.creation.freeze.desc: Freezing your metadata will allow you to permanently lock and store all of this item's content in decentralized file storage.
page.nft.creation.freeze.note: To freeze your metadata, you must create your item first.
page.nft.creation.name.label: Name
page.nft.creation.external_link.label: External link
page.nft.creation.external_link.desc: Wadza will include a link to this URL on this item's detail page, so that users can click to learn more about it. You are welcome to link your own webpage with more details.
page.nft.creation.description_english.de: The description will be included on the item's detail page underneath its image. Markdown syntax is supported.
page.nft.creation.description_arabic.des: The description will be included on the item's detail page for Arabic version underneath its image. Markdown syntax is supported.
page.nft.creation.description_placeholde: Provide a detailed description of your item
page.nft.creation.supply.name: Supply
page.nft.creation.supply.desc: The number of items that can be minted. No gas cost to you!
page.nft.creation.add_property_modal.des: Properties show up underneath your item, are clickable, and can be filtered in your collection's sidebar.
page.nft.creation.add_level_modal.title: Add levels
page.nft.creation.add_level_modal.desc: Levels show up underneath your item, are clickable, and can be filtered in your collection's sidebar.
page.nft.creation.add_stat_modal.title: Add stats
page.nft.creation.add_stat_modal.desc: Stats show up underneath your item, are clickable, and can be filtered in your collection's sidebar.
page.nft.creation.unlockable_content.pla: Enter content (access key, code to redeem, link to a file, etc.)
page.collections.title: You didn't create a collection yet
page.collections.desc: Create, curate, and manage collections of unique NFTs to share and sell.
page.collection.creation.logo_image.desc: This image will also be used for navigation. 350 x 350 recommended.
This image will be used for featuring your collection on the homepage, category pages, or other promotional areas of Wadza. 600 x 400 recommended.
page.collection.creation.banner_image.de: This image will appear at the top of your collection page. Avoid including too much text in this banner image, as the dimensions change on different devices. 1400 x 350 recommended.
page.collection.creation.links.label: Links
page.collection.creation.creator_fee.des: Collection owners can collect a fee when a user re-sells an item they created. Contact the collection owner to change the fee percentage or the payout address.
page.collection.creation.explicit.label: Explicit & sensitive content
page.collection.creation.explicit.desc: Set this collection as explicit and sensitive content
Turn on after all items revealed and attribute metadata is finalized.
page.collection.creation.url.label: URL
page.collection.creation.url.desc: Customize your URL on Wadza. Must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.
page.collection.creation.description.des: Markdown syntax is supported. 0 of 1000 characters used.
page.collection.creation.description_eng: Provide a detailed description of your collection
page.collection.creation.description_ara: Provide a detailed description of your collection in Arabic
page.collection.creation.category.desc: Adding a category will help make your item discoverable on Wadza.
page.collection.creation.tokens.label: Payment tokens
page.collection.creation.tokens.desc: These tokens can be used to buy and sell your items.
page.collection.creation.theme.label: Display theme
page.collection.creation.theme.desc: Change how your items are shown.
page.collection.creation.theme.padded.de: Recommended for assets with transparent background
page.collection.creation.theme.contained: Recommended for assets that are not 1:1 ratio
page.collection.creation.theme.covered.d: Recommended for assets that are not 1:1 ratio
page.profile.banner.description: You don't have a cover image, please upload one now.
page.settings.title: Profile details
page.settings.profile.social_connections: Help collectors verify your account by connecting social accounts
page.settings.profile.profile_image.desc: This image will also be used for your profile image. 350 x 350 recommended.
page.settings.profile.banner_image.desc: This image will appear at the top of your profile page. Avoid including too much text in this banner image, as the dimensions change on different devices. 1400 x 350 recommended.
page.nft_detail.collection.description.n: This collection has no description yet. Contact the owner of this collection about setting it up on Wadza!
page.nft_detail.collection.nft_detail.me: This item's metadata is being hosted on server, but is not editable by the creator
page.nft_detail.list.title: List for sale
page.nft_detail.list.type_of_sale.fixed_: The item is listed at the price you set.
page.nft_detail.list.type_of_sale.timed_: The item is listed for auction. Learn More
page.nft_detail.list.choose_method.highe: The highest bid wins at the end.
page.nft_detail.list.choose_method.decli: The price falls until someone purchases the item.
page.nft_detail.list.set_duration.label: Set duration
page.nft_detail.list.more_options.label: More options
page.nft_detail.list.more_options.set_re: This item can be purchased as soon as it's listed

page.referrals.banner.title: Wadza Affiliate Program
page.referrals.banner.desc: Earn up to 20% of your invitees' sold NFT fees with Wadza NFT marketplace.
page.referrals.how_it_works.desc: Join our affiliate program and earn commission by promoting Wadza.
page.referrals.how_it_works.block1.title: Become an affiliate
page.referrals.how_it_works.block1.desc: Join our affiliate program, get your unique code and link.
page.referrals.how_it_works.block2.title: Promote Wadza
page.referrals.how_it_works.block2.desc: Share your link or code in social media, with your friend and communities.
page.referrals.how_it_works.block3.title: Earn Commissions
page.referrals.how_it_works.block3.desc: When users joined with your link or code sells an NFT, you will get a commission.
page.referrals.become_an_affiliate.title: Become a wadza affiliate
page.referrals_join.title: Affiliate Program
page.referrals_join.subtitle: Join our affiliate program
page.referrals_join.subdesc: Become an affiliate and win rewards when contributors sign up using your referral code. You can get 20% of the profits or more of their sales.
page.referrals_join.label.create_code: Create your unique link and promo code
page.referrals_join.input_nickname.desc: This unique nickname will be used as your promo code and for your unique link.
page.referrals_analysis.subtitle: Share your link and promo code with your friends and earn money
page.referrals_analysis.subdesc: Share your unique link or promo code with your community, friends, and so on. And earn money when they sell any NFT. You will be paid in ETH in the wallet of your account.
page.referrals_analysis.activity.desc: See how you are doing as an affiliate of Wadza. Track your performance and profit.
page.modal.add_funds.title: Add funds
page.modal.add_funds.desc: You can add funds using your Visa Card, Mastercard, or American Express. The funds will be converted to and stored in your wallet. You can also add your funds directly as ETH.
page.modal.add_funds.deposit_crypto.desc: Transfer funds from an exchange or another wallet to your wallet address below: (Only send ETH or any other ERC-20 token to this address.)
page.modal.my_wallet.title: My wallet
page.account.settings.tab.featured_items: Featured items will appear on your profile's “Featured” tab. You can feature up to 10 items per section.
Choose up to 10 items to feature
Are you sure you want to delete this section?
Select which notifications you would like to receive for
When someone purchased one of your items
When someone bids on one of your items
When an item you made an offer on changes in price
When a timed auction you created ends
When an offer you placed is exceeded by another user
When a significant update occurs for one of the items you have purchased on Wadza
When you successfully buy an item
Occasional updates from the Wadza team
Receive notifications only when you receive offers with a value greater than or equal to this amount of ETH.
page.account.settings.tab.offers.title: Offer settings
page.account.settings.tab.offers.desc: Set a minimum offer for collections to ignore low offers.
page.navbar.email_login.modal.title: Login using your email
page.login.modal.desc.4: create an account using your email
page.navbar.email_signup.modal.title: Create an account using your email
page.navbar.email_signup.modal.desc: New to web3? Don't worry, we got you, create an account the traditional way, and we will create a wallet for you.
Password must include upper and lowercase letters
page.navbar.email_signup.modal.referral_: Add referral code if you have
page.navbar.email_signup.modal.check.des: By creating a wallet and using Wadza, I agree to Wadza
page.navbar.verify_email.modal.title: Verify your email
page.navbar.verify_email.modal.desc.2: to verify your email address and activate your account. The link in the email will expire in 24 hours. Or just enter the verification code here.
page.navbar.verify_email.modal.tip.3: if you did not receive an email or would like to change the email address you signed up with.
